content.detailedDescription:
Día 21 de febrero del 2015 21:09 a 21:14 aproximadamente una luz roja en el centro con destellos anaranjados alrededor, orientación noroeste vista desde las rozas hacia sierra de guadarrama, parecía rectangular cambiando a circular a una altura baja desde mi perspectiva a su derecha con más altura acompañada por otra esfera amarillenta, parecía estar fija desapareciendo por momentos, y volviéndola a ver con la misma intensidad, su movimiento era vertical, muy despacio ha ido descendiendo hasta perderla de vista. 

day february 21, 2015 21:09 to 21:14 approximately a red light in the center with orange flashes around west orientation view from las rozas to sierra de guadarrama, changing rectangular seemed to move at a low height from my perspective to his more right height accompanied by another yellow sphere, seemed fixed disappearing at times, and returning it to do with the same intensity, their movement was vertical, slowly gone down to keep her in sight.
content.summary: Luz roja en el centro con destellos anaranjados alrededor, orientación noroeste vista desde las rozas hacia sierra de guadarrama, parecía rectangular cambiando a circular a una altura baja desde mi perspectiva

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed the object when i started editing my pics from my guatemala trip.
the object doesn't appear in the previous frame taken 6 sec earlier or the next frame after.
i didn't know about its existance until just a few days ago when i started editing my pics from the trip. it does appear to be a silver shape when i zoom in.

george.
content.summary: I noticed the object when i started editing my pics from my guatemala trip

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the moon last night and found a strange disc in the picture with red and green lights below and to the right of the object. it only showed in one picture only. it may be nothing but i thought i should report it in case. thank you for your time,
content.summary: Found in picture after

content.detailedDescription: I was just walking by the patio door when i noticed a extremely bright light next to the moon with a small red one above it to the right a little. observed this object for an hour and a half, i have seen it before and even have witnessed the little red one moving farther away and back again from the stationary object.
content.summary: Two lights next to moon

content.detailedDescription: I was at my residence in the backyard watching a camp fire with friends. someone looked up and noticed bright red lights through the trees to the north. i thought the lights were a squadron of military helicopters flying in a straight line however after a few seconds realized the objects were completely silent. there were 5 orbs in a straight line spaced equally apart. all were traveling at the same speed and after a minute the dark red color of each object changed to a lighter amber color. after 1.5 minutes each object faded and disappeared sequentially. one additional orb came after singly 30 seconds later along the same path and faded similarly. no one in the group could explain what the objects were. i was very excited as i've been researching the ufo phenomenon for at least 4 years. i am an environmental scientist with 15 years experience in government with 10 years experience in helicopter aerial monitoring. based on my observation and experience, these objects were not conventional aircraft or chinese lanterns.
content.summary: 6 red-orange orbs traversed across the sky from east to west

content.detailedDescription: I am a professional photographer who was covering an event at the devils lake tip up festival when i noticed the object and photographed it.  it appears to almost be on fire
content.summary: Object appeared and was photographed by me

content.detailedDescription: While on a business trip in dubai, after visiting the burj khalifa (world tallest building) my driver was driving on the highway. as we passed the world’s tallest building i decided to snap a few photos using my iphone 6 plus. i took 2 photos while driving down the highway and noticed nothing in the frame of either photo that night (9:43:47 local time). the next day i was showing the photos i took to my driver and saw the image in the frame that is still yet unexplained. the second image was taken within the same second and it shown no object in the frame. the building has façade lighting that displays verbiage that begins at the bottom and ascends upward, this can be seen beginning in the first frame and progressing in the second image.
content.summary: Shot 2 photos 1st showed object 2nd did not

content.detailedDescription: Back in the korean war, my grandfather was stationed in kentucky as an army painter and cartographer. he told me that one night he went out of the barracks for a brief moment and saw red and green auras flying through the sky at surprisingly fast rates. he called all the other enlisted men out of the barracks and they all watched in amazement as the objects buzzed through the sky. he never explained more than that about the crafts themselves. when my grandfather went to go tell the general, whom he was very close with, what had occurred, the general said, "you're crazy, and you never saw a thing," then abruptly dismissed him.
content.summary: Korean war military base

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i was abducted in cape town south africa, this was after bed time around midnight, from 1957 to 1978. i remember looking out of a window looking down at earth from space i felt a bit dizzy but excited, i could see the oceans and land. after these events i had migraines on a weekly basis, as well on weekly basis i had nose bleeds, after these events i could not remember anything, i had a short memory and at school i could not remember my subjects, that is my results at school were very bad. my mother always told us about a man in black suit, hat and dark glasses and she found this very strange as we were not close to any towns and off the beaten track. i moved from cape town to croatia which was a socialist country in 1978 and in 1979 i migrated to australia. after moving all migraines and nose bleeds stopped, however my short memory is still with me at age 62.

i saw a doctor and all he said was i was an insecure child, so i started to analyse that in 1957 i could never have seen any color photo from outer space and i think russia might have had a sputnik in space. i was not in school and i had not seen any books about space. please let me know if other people had similar events. 

cheers
content.summary: In a part of a spaceship

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my apartment and noticed a red light flying in a particular manner that didn't look like a plane. as soon as i noticed it was peculiar it turned 180 degree circle and flew north. then it flew west and then east and came back south moving at speeds i had not seen any aircraft move before and i am a private pilot. it pivoted back north again and then rapidly descended to the visible horizon.
content.summary: Red and blue light flying in seemingly random path with speeds and direction changes unlike known aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister had to travel about 45 minutes to high school. we lived in antioch, and our school was in inglewood, tenn. we traveled so that we could stay at the same school we started at. we always travel on briley pkwy. as a shortcut. we had just past grand old opry turn of and were about to start the curve that that is just before the cumberland river and saw it protruding out of the river on the left of the pkwy.. it appeared and disappeared in a matter of seconds. it was as if it made a mistake and became visible and then realized it and went back invisible. it wasn't moving it was stationary. it didn't look to be leaving anytime soon. i got the impression it had been there awhile. completely, invisible!!! i asked my sister if she had seen the same thing and she said she did. though i find it odd that we never really talked about it at all. really never did. it was real exciting for a very short time and then i really never thought about it again. i didn't forget it, it just seems that it was put in the back of my mind as if it was just every day. strange yes. i think that you are looking in the wrong place. stop looking up so much and find a way to see them where they are. here on the ground. i know they exist. what i saw could not have been mistaken. there was nothing around us or near that would have looked like that or have been mistaken as such. 1. is answered., 2. it appeared out of the corner of my eye and i turned and looked at it., 3. only one thing it could have been. no way it could have been anything else, just by the build of it. there was and still is nothing built like that was., 4. as i said, i was very excited for a second and then it was as if it was just a everyday thing. it was kind of weird now that i think back., 6. it disappeared, not by leaving! it went invisible. no movement! more than just me and my sister had to of seen it the pkwy. was busy.
content.summary: As wewere going to school. it appeared and disappeared while stationary. with part in the water and the rest sticking out high over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway in my truck when i first spotted a light in the corner of my eye, as i got out i glanced at the sky as i always do and over the tip of the tallest tree in the neighborhood i see a blinking light stationary over the tree, east thinking i know its not a plane so what could it be. i watched it for a few minutes, between that time i noticed another similar blinking light in the woods where i live by, north east, this light was weird, almost like it was a flashlight but it moved positions too rapidly to be a person, it went higher up and came back down as if it was about to touch ground. the light had a oval shape ness, it was gray and white, it had a rising star design to it. it moved like an orb, like a supernatural ghost orb. it moved in circles and cut across higher to lower. as i went to reach for my phone both lights moved as if it was moving with my hand to my pocket. i thought hell with the phone i know this is happening. the light in the woods got to a dimmer state to the point i had to squint to see it. i went to find a better area for viewing and as i did the light over the tree top was gone. at that time of searching for it i seen another light, like a shooting star, it was over the tree top going south east, it left behind a red trail of light, something similar to what a plane would leave behind in the sky, cloud type. it went up and down in elevation as it headed in that direction until it got out of my sight. my mouth was wide open, thought to myself this is real, gave myself a slap, rubbed my eyes, took off my glasses, it was all still there in the sky. i want to see these again they were so beautiful. they hovered with my laughter, flew away because they're shy. i don't know what these lights were, i've never seen anything like this before, i've witnessed ufos in the sky but these were different, they were star like. could i have witnessed a star dying? i don't know. i'm going to be doing research and finding more information. i'm scared, i feel like life could be over, is this the end of our world? my name is [name removed/cms/tg], i witnessed this at my home in woonsocket, rhode island, i believe i will see these again. [email removed/cms/tg] please contact me and let me know your stories.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed lights in the sky, am i seeing things?

content.detailedDescription:
I observed other oil field workers looking up in sky i started seeing bright orbs moving across
the sky. i immediatley started taking photos and video prior to the siting my self and several other workers heard a loud boom across the field from fracking site.When i started video i got some videio then object disapeared. i talked to others out on job alot men got pictures before me.
content.summary: While working out in oil field objects observed by various men

content.detailedDescription: Was watching a  movie very late at nite,looked over the window n i saw that item flaoting and cganging positions very fast. had lights turning under it slowly,i watched the show and it desapeared in the sky so fast.
content.summary: An oval shape with lights turning at the bottom slowly,movinge odd directions

content.detailedDescription: Was watching a  movie very late at nite,looked over the window n i saw that item flaoting and cganging positions very fast. had lights turning under it slowly,i watched the show and it desapeared in the sky so fast.
content.summary: An oval shape with lights turning at the bottom slowly,movinge odd directions

content.detailedDescription:
Outside, driving home from grocery store. noticed 2 lights next to waxing crescent moon. arrived home. viewed non moving lights next to the moon at around 9 pm for 15 minutes.
came inside to drop off groceries. brought my 12 y/o son outside to look at lights w/ me. moon is moving (as it should ), but 1 white and 1 red light (red light at a 30 degree angle to the right of the white light) appear stationary. view for the next 15 minutes and lights stay stationary to the moons movement. inside at 930 pm. 
returned outside at 1015pm and moon moved past horizon and lights gone.
content.summary: 2 lights that did not move next to sliver moon. did not move for at least 1 hr.

content.detailedDescription: While walking from my apartment to parking lot, on clear night i looked south toward the airport i'm retired but still love aircraft, so i always scan the skies. off in the distance to the south i observed a bright royal blue light just above the horizon. me being in aviation for 43 years with a faa a&p certification i knew this was not a aircraft. as i watched i got my cell phone out and took a couple of photos and 2 videos (video not very good). i watched with experienced eyes for the details that differs a aircraft from a unknown object. the object slowly moved from south to north increasing in size as it come closer. at about 2 miles it made a 90 degree horizontal turn to the east, a exact angle of 90 degree turn, no sweep turn and no loss of altitude. traveled about a mile then turned a 180 degree turn and continued heading west about 2 miles made another 90 deg. turn  to the south and shortly turned again east for a few seconds then turned south until it disappeared over the horizon. it was moving in the same airspace as several aircraft on departure from bush intercontinental airport. this object had no aircraft resemblances. this was my first ufo in over 43 years working and flying on all types of aircraft. during the video my cell phone completely turned off and i had to restart it to continue.
content.summary: Observed over bush intco. airport

content.detailedDescription:
We live on an outlet to barnegat bay about 2 blocks from the ocean and about a mile from a coast guard station. helicopters, including black ones, are frequent sights. on three occasions this past month around the same time at night- between 1 & 2 am, a brilliant white orb was seen over the lagoon behind our home. we observed this from our third floor bedroom. we had just gone to bed but were still awake reading. the light was so brilliant, turning more blue, and then thinned into a blue line, which may have been the edge of a craft. we went to the patio doors and what seemed to be a transparent craft simply vanished. this has happened a few times in recent weeks. a previous report i made mentioned a large, dark wedge shaped craft with 5 round white brilliant lights was hovering about 20 feet over the ocean's edge, silent and moving very slowly. it remained in place as long as we stayed to watch- we were there almost 20 minutes. my husband became uncomfortable, so we left. (i wanted to stay and see if they'd take me for a ride).
since then, the orbs/lights have been a repeated occurrence. on one occasion, my husband observed three humanoid beings surrounded with brilliant blue light come into our room through closed doors. it was about 2 am, he was reading in bed, and i was asleep, and they began to come towards my side of the bed.  my husband "heard" one of them say "he is a friend of ____(hard to understand) we must leave". then they simply went back through the doors. he got up and followed them, but by the time he got to the living room they had vanished. i woke up as they left the room, but neither of us looked out the patio doors for a craft- we were pretty shook up. the beings have not returned, but the orbs/lights turning into craft have been seen by us a few times since that "visit".
content.summary: 3 sightings of brilliant light turning into craft; 1 occasion 3 humanoids emitting blue light came into bedroom through closed doors

content.detailedDescription:
I turned my camera to face straight up into the dark sky & just clicked camera that took a picture. i have been taking pictures this way(which means i don't see anything) randomly since july or august 2014. this particular night, 2/13/2014 @ 12:09am i captured what looks like an alien. i have two photos of it as when ever i'm taking pictures i always take 2-3 pictures whether i can see the object(s) with my eyes or not. 
this alien picture was taken from my second story apartment on the patio.
i have pictures of lights that are of a spaceship that was taken the same way as the pictured mentioned above. i've captured a green streak, red streak & things that look like ropes (these i couldn't see with my eyes).

i also interact with some of the "stars" on a regular basis. i point to one particular "star" & motion for it to come down towards me & it does. then i point to another & do the same. what ever they are they are really intelligent.

i tried to file this report before but my internet connection always cut out when i would click the submit button. i did send an e-mail to jan, can't remember his last name but he's the executive director & he responded & he also copied me a message he sent to jeff krouse, & he did call me but i wasn't able to take call.
content.summary: Captured picture of ailien from above

content.detailedDescription:
The summer of'76 late night or early morning.I got out of bed and went to the window. over the trees at the far side of the house was a bright white perfect pyramid craft. my first thought was it was a two man ship.The mainbody of it was bright white and spun rapidly but it flew straight. on one point was a blue light on one tip a green light and on the other tip was    white light. part of me remembers a red light somewhere anyway,my room was at one end of the house and when i first saw it, it it was at the far side of the house,i remember touching my eyes to make sure i was awake it was maybe20,25feet off the ground maybe10 feet away from the side of the house slowly flying parallel to the second floor of the house. there was no sound, at first i was amazed then i thought if i can see it they can see me then i had an overwhelming feeling of dread and fear.I ran to the closet
and hid. i remember seeing the bright light under the door and then i'm in my mom's room crying and she's telling me to go back to sleep my dad walked me back to my room and my friend who was sleeping over said she saw something in the neighbors drive way.Next thing i know i'm coming home from school the next day then when my dad got home he tol qd my mom that she should have believed me cause in the paper was an article that said the town about30minutes away saw the same thing i saw. after that she always looked at the sky she wanted to see them too. iwas13when that happened i'm 51now i can't talk about it without crying even after all these years i don't know what happened to make me cry when i think about it still . i do have a lot of dreams about ships in the sky and i see the the tall shining blonde beautiful people. but i had to tell someone about my sighting even though it was a long time ago.I'm still a little scared that the "men in black"will come to the door.  if you think i could help i'd talk to you i've seen triangle ufo's on your show some are similar but not quite.I'm willing to do hypnosis just to put my
mind to rest. thank you for listening.
deirdre osborne
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What appeared to be a 2man perfect pyrimid craft  outside my house

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside one night at about 9:40p.M. on 5-19-2012,and as i walked to my car i was facing due west and right in front of me,[which is actually 3 houses away from me, but, i had nothing in my way of sight] there was a large fire/orange ball desending right in front of me.. i don't remember just exactly how high it was when i first seen this, very bright object coming down from the sky,,,,,but,, without any warning or anything to suggest that something is about to happen,,,,,this redish/orange ball is coming down from the sky that is about the size of a small house,,when suddenly 7 very white, very bright and ready these 7 very white very bright were also very flat... flat, as in the lights gave no flare or glow or beam, don't know what it may be called when a light goes on and you can see the light filling-up the darkness,,,the ships 7 lights gave off none of what a normal light does when its turned on....Ok,,,ready for this one,,,,,,as this craft desended at one point the 7 lights came on blinking very very fast,,,,,,which in turn caused the craft to slow its decent and the blinking slowed as the craft slowed down, until it came to a complete stop just above a 2 story apartment building.....No noise at all from the time i first seen it coming down , it made no noise..After about 5 minutes this craft moved very slowly but steady due north, into blackstone,ma.As it was moving a niebor was there i showed her and then went in my house and got my wife and son,, at that time this craft was a mere fire/orange ball moving silently north....Ok these very white and bright lights were in fact,, one of its propultion systems...When the lights first came on blincking it kinda blinded my for a second[ kinda like a camera flash]....Me, i have been looking at the sky day/night mostly night time,, since i was 19 years old, hoping to see anything awesome, which i have many times i seen some strange things in the sky, so, when i seen this red/orange ball coming down i wasn't excited yet, it could be anything,,,but when 7 lights come on blinking and slowing down the crafts decent,, this is real living thing controlling that........I will tell you in detail not sure if i forgot anything,, but i will tell the same thing under a lie-detector the best $$$ can get[for real] and if i fail i will pay for the test.... which i really have no money to waste,,and i see the greatest and very imformational ufo sighting in the world......Ok ready for this one... i have wrote this in the nasa data base for reporting ufos 3 times,,,because the first 2 times they were removed from there website...I put it in again not sure if its still there,,,i wrote to a few sites right after the sighting and also wrote it down in a book i have....Also a year and a half ago i go outside my house ,just before dark,, and my son who was outside already tells me he just seen a orange ball in the sky,, and suddenly another orange ball comes out of the clouds, so i get my camera and videoed it,,[i got it on film]]]]and then in july the beginning two more orange orbs are there agin, my son friend got this on film [very good]no idea what these can be there very small mybe a softball  not really sure...Oh, yeah i wasn't the only person to see this in woonsocket.,, theres others that seen, and wrote it in nasa............
content.summary: Fire-orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette on a mostly clear freezing cold winter night looking at the stars, and watching planes flying overhead. in between my neighbor's house to the west and another house, i saw what i thought was a single gold/copper light coming from a plane headed in my direction. this was not uncommon because it was near an establish flight path directly over my house. i watched it come closer, and it looked like it was gaining altitude. i looked down at the snow at my feet and around my yard for a minute, and when i looked back up at the light it had turned into two lights side by side. it looked like it was still headed in my direction and slowly gaining altitude. the lights did not flash like normal airplane lights, the seemed to almost shimmer like a star. thinking that it was still a plane, and how far apart the lights seemed to be, i thought that the lights represented the end of each wing. it gave it the appearance that it was really close. i didn't hear a sound coming from the object. as it was gaining altitude the lights seemed to tip up and down, like if they were the tips of a plane, that it was having a little bit of trouble staying stable. it was quite windy out that night with gusts of wind. it got so close to my neighbors house that i thought it would make contact and crash. my neighbor's house is only .03 miles away so it is very close. as i watched it, it disappeared from view blocked by this house. i waited a couple of minutes expecting it to clear the house, or crash but i never saw the lights again. again, there was not a sound.
content.summary: One light turned into two and steadily ascended until out of view

content.detailedDescription:
1. i just came home from my yoga class and when i was on my balcony i saw the first object. 
2. i can´t recall what made me first notice the object. 
3. i was pretty sure that i was seeing 2 ufos. 
4. the two objects seemed to change their shape. they were more or less following the same path. from north to south, in the west of my position. and finally going down below the houses. although they could have gone further to the south and so it might only have seemed that they were going down. 
5. while i was filming them i was pretty exited and a little bit scared. especially because of the black color. when i watched it later on the beamer ( bigger) i saw that the second object had some colors, which somehow made me relax. 
6. houses were blocking the sight.
content.summary: The 2 objects appeared within a few minutes and then descended

content.detailedDescription:
I never saw the physical visitor, a conversation just started, first one sided as it seemed i would never get to talk. it felt as though the entity was very polite, well educated, a feeling of cleanliness ?

he occupied most talk, stating how gullible humans have been over the years. described flight of most ufo's and the observations one would have if/when encountering one.

silent...Unbelievable movement, with no curbs on speed, maneuverability and ability to build it's own environment even to a shield of sorts emitted as movement began .

there seemed to be a chuckle as he explained a device which had two units both being hollow and made of solid gold (he joked, "ever try to breathe gold? then why would every human believe visitors who kept hauling off gold were doing so to "fix" their environment"). one unit caused an enclosed (no noise) amount of mercury to be circulated  clock wise while the other circulated counter clock wise. as the mercury speeds up more momentum keeps building in what is now a motionless gyro. seemed pretty wise to keep moving parts to a minimum,.These units were mounted so as to be able to raise or lower, tilt in or out resulting in forward, up down or any combination needed. in the center was the power unit and as he never went into detail other than nuclear, i never asked once again. sometimes it seemed as though i was not bright enough to carry my end of the conversation.

i find it difficult even now to say all i saw or heard so long ago, and am afraid the message may go unused if i can't sit down with someone who would help pick the seeds planted on my head.
content.summary: Person? never showed as entity, it just had to be human, or so i felt.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home from court on i 5 south, i noticed the traffic slowed and drivers looking up in the sky.  i saw a bright orb with what i first thought was a very short contrail above it.  i thought to myself that it might be a jet going straight down and about to crash.  there was no angle
to its direction except straight down.  then i realized it wasn't moving, just hanging in the sky.  the contrail/flame portion above the shiny orb never got any longer, the angle never changed, the distance to me never changed and the location never changed.  the tear shape was straight up and down but at about 80 degree angle to the horizon.  as i continued to drive home i hovered there the whole time.  once i drove behind a hill and briefly it lost sight of it but the i saw again as i got off at my exit.  when i got home i went out in my back yard and could no longer see it.
content.summary: Tear-shaped or bright white flame shaped stationary in the sky for 15 min.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend at chichén itzá to see the 'light & sound show' on friday the 13th of february 2015 between 19:00 and 20:00. it was a clear night and we could see the stars. at approximately 19:15, before the 'light & sound show' began, my girlfriend pointed to a "star" in the sky. my girlfriend and i saw a straight line of white light rapidly changing direction in the night sky. after a few seconds, i realised that it wasn't a star or a plane. my girlfriend agreed that it was "strange" and that it wasn't a star or a plane. it appeared to be quite high above the cenote sagrado de chichén itzá.

i took two photos of the 'object' with a digital camera, using the zoom lens and no flash. i regretted not recording a video. after about a minute, the 'object' disappeared. immediately after the sighting, i continued to take photos of the pyramid at chichén itzá. as far as i know, this was my first sighting of a 'ufo'.

i later discovered that there's a disused aerodrome nearby. however, the 'object' appeared to be larger than a model aircraft and moved and changed direction rapidly in straight lines, both horizontally and vertically, not like any aircraft i've seen before. it was nothing like a shooting star or comet. as far as i know, the lights used in the show are simply projectors used to project images onto solid surfaces. the light we saw appeared to be coming from the sky, away from solid surfaces.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Straight line of white light rapidly changing direction in night sky near chichén itzá, mexico

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of december 19th 2014, i was out early in the morning my   between 5:30-5:15am. i took one picture of the moon, looked at my screen and saw an object. i looked in sky and saw nothing. i took two other photos, looking to the sky between taking the pictures. i saw the images on my camera, but never saw any sort of twinkle, dimmed light of any source of light other than the moon.

the thing that makes this interesting is that the photos were taken above, and at the end of the dobbins air reserve base in marietta. i do not believe these were any kind of distant incoming aircraft. i never saw any lights what so ever. i am retired from lockheed martin in marietta, and have covered the flight line for years. i know, and have been around air planes all of my life. this is the first time i have ever seen anything like these objects on my photos.
content.summary: Taking pictures of the moon dec 19th 2014. i never saw the objects in the pictures with naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching michear jodan den i saw a brig bruncha bright rights stat fryin' to me. then they exproded. de en.
content.summary: Big exprosion.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the night sky observing the stars i seen a faint light what i first believed was a plane but there were no tell tail marker lights blinking. i observed its flight path for a time and noted its altitude and speed was well beyond any high altitude plane i've ever observed in the military or commercial flights. also the light began to shift from side to side smoothly and quickly without losing speed as if avoiding something in its path. i kept track of it and called to my roommate to come outside and check it out and she also seen its flight path and pattern of movement and we both agreed it was something more then a plane or satellite. after a rather speedy flight path we lost sight of it off in the distance and high altitude within a short time span. i am a former military flight deck handler on a amphibious aircraft carrier. i have seen a number of flight paths and patterns and planes in my term of military life. i seen what planes  do at high altitudes in all sorts of weather and that night even at that height no plane i've ever seen nor heard of could have moved in the way this object did. unfortunately the event was so short lived i couldn't gather any photo evidence and i doubt anything i own would have been able to visually pic it up well because of the altitude it was seen in the sky. in my opinion though i believe the object wasn't so much in the atmosphere due to the height i seen it at. call it a gut instinct but i firmly will never believe what i seen was a plane or satellite or even space junk.
content.summary: Flight path with eratict directional change as if avoiding objects no objects seen in path

content.detailedDescription: I would carpool with my husband each workday for college.  he would work in his office and i would grab a bit of sleep as it was still very early and before my classes started.  it was 4 am when i was putting down my seat as usual to take my nap.  it was dark in the parking lot, i put my blanket over myself and closed my eyes and felt a presence. i can't say if i heard anything but i just felt something there perhaps the figures cast a slight shadow.  i turned onto my back to look out the window and suddenly i could not move or scream.  i saw 2 figures that appeared like the grays i have heard of.  they were a little taller than the car.  they had a light gray and smooth flesh appearance. i could not move my head so i could not look at their bodies much but to see their heads.  i was caught by their eyes.  very dark and deep looking and had the almond shape. the shape of their heads was elongated and larger than their bodies.  an metal cold cylindrical instrument with a needle on the end of it, was coming through the window at me and it started entering my head. the area at the instrument at the window seemed almost like melted glass if i could find words for it. i wanted to move away from it but couldn't move at all.  it hurt like a searing, burning intense pain.  i was thinking my thoughts to them, "stop, go away, don't" but they didn't communicate with me in any way that i remember.  i was terrified!  i just wanted them to stop what they were doing.  it felt as if that tool that had a needle with a long handle had gone into my sinuses above my right ear. i couldn't believe it seemed as though it was going through the metal and the glass of the car and into my head!  how?  i could not move at all but for my eyes and that seemed to be a bit limited?  the tool retracted instantly and they were gone as quickly as they appeared.  i could move again.  i was out of that car so fast and into my husbands office so fast!  i was now hysterically telling him what just happened and he thought that i had just had a nightmare but it was very real.  i had not had time to go to sleep.  i have had sinus issues and have since gone out on permanent disability.  i had a sinus surgery and they told me that they found rat cells?  i asked how that could be?  the doctor changed the subject and never did answer me.  i feel that it had to have come from that time in the parking lot.  i have had pain in that same area of my head off and on since that attack.  i get a searing pain that i can't really even think when it happens.  i call them attacks. i don't know what they did but i don't like them at all!  they have caused me a lot of continued pain.  for me the object was the tool they sent into my head as i did not see any craft.
content.summary: A tool w/needle was sent through my vehicles closed window and into my head above my right ear into my sinuses i could not move or speak but could move eyes
